rattrap shoots his acid gun at obsidian, his energy-drainers at tankor and his cannon at silverbolt
while the obsidian tankor and silverbolt shoot their respective cannons at rattrap
 Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:OOC:  Sorry I took so long, but Flicker has a simple
laser rifle as his weapon (as I recall, it's been a
while).  By the way please e-mail me about what's
happening too him.

--- cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
> Flicker::
> 
> "Come on, come on, just a few more seconds ..." the
> bot in question 
> mutters under his breath as he toils away in the
> medbay.  He's 
> working on a device to paralyze a single
> transformer, which would 
> give him the perfect opporunity to use the same as a
> hostage.  "Done!"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...>
> wrote:
> > Perceptor::
> > 
> > "Master"said Perceptor by comm link by Galvatron
> (in a frecuency 
> that 
> > just Galvatron could receive)"I have an personal
> idea to prove a 
> > small teory that  could give us a advantage
> against our enemies... 
> > but I need your permission to have a commlink with
> Flicker..."
> 
>
